stimulusHtml: A group of researchers conduct a study where they tell the participants that they will be doing a memory study, but the researchers were actually measuring levels of anxiety about doing well on a task. The group of researchers should be sure to do which of the following at the conclusion of this study?
choicesHtml:
Use deception so the participants won't know the true nature of the study.

Identify the confounding variables to improve the statistical accuracy of the study.

Explain the purpose of a study before the study begins.

Explain the true purpose of a study immediately after the study is complete.
